sourceFiles.description: The path to the local files that you wish to upload. In the case of a static site, these should already be compiled (ie webpack).

bucketName.description: The name of the S3 bucket where the files should be uploaded. Prefixing with 'cfe:', such as 'cfe:SomeS3Bucket', will lookup the value of SomeS3Bucket from Cloudformation exports. If the value doesn't exist, an error will be thrown.

region.description: (Optional) The AWS region where requests will be sent. Will default to the local system default.

profile.description: (Optional) The AWS credentials profile that will be used to make requests. Default system AWS credentials will be used if omitted.

batchSize.description: (Optional) The number of files that will be present in each batch. Batched files are uploaded in parallel. Default is 500.

progress.description: (Optional) Display upload progress. True by default.

deleteFiles.description: (Optional) Should files be deleted in S3 if they are no longer present in the local directory. True by default.
